att2.advancement.collection.weapon_angba: Yes indeed, it's the real one!
Never fails those who handle it boldly.
Behind this worn-out appearance lies a youthful spirit.

Pleasing the child of darkness and in his intentions, following him ...

It takes at least an arm like that to handle it.
To you the eldest that killed so many beasts with its strokes.
It is so robust that even the rock	bends under its will.
Even the insect of the crash is frightened	at the sight of your sharp shine!
The Secarian beasts once feared your claws as much as your name.
A plank to protect the flesh.
To you, the immortal, for whom neither age nor fatigue	have any meaning. A simple rest will wipe them out.

Better alone than in bad company.
A good excuse for doing nothing.
What fiction do you think you're in?
A real sword for an immortal soldier of Angor.
The only thing that sets you apart	from them is your ancestry...
Unconscious to the point of losing your colour, violent to the point of confusing friend with enemy.
Remember the time before time, and transcend yourself through the hands of the true master.
att2.advancement.collection.weapon_billg: Almost fantastic, but close to absolutely useless.
No one will ever tell you that you have pointy bones again.
Better on the ground than in your hands.
As if you had its strength.
Here, there is no greater quality, because the coldness does not exempt from ardour.
Behind beauty often lies an occult power.
Hymn of supplication to the divinity unable to protect us from ourselves.
No rest for those who cannot die, no dreams for those who cannot sleep.
Do not use it as a shield. Thank you.
The color of hope will enliven your will, sister.
The desire of one is not enough for the peace of a world to endure.
Endures, proud as the sky, tenacious as time, to the unattainable horizon of perseverance.
For the fastest of my friends.
To the vilest as well as the best.
The dust of what was once a mighty golem.
Forgive, we shall not.	Forget, we shall not.
Ode to the fierceness of the first inorganic, scream of a king.
Even the most stable of things will never stand in the way of Entropy's unwavering purpose.
att2.advancement.collection.weapon_diamo: Signed the end of a monarch.
The truth is yours, and only you can make it heard.
Only waits for a master to absolve evil.
Even at your birth, your will burned with an irresistible intensity.
The strength and honor of the immortal hardly diminishes in the face of darkness.
To the pomp of a powerful dignitary.
I've come face to face with myself, man. Sanctify the early light just like the old man can, boy.
The one able to wield it will be carried to the highest degree of influence.
Grow up, but never spoil yourself.
Solid as a diamond, she goes.
Sumptuous, nothing ever made you weaken your power.
Howl at the lost years, your cry will make heaven and hearts tremble to the ends of time.
No one will know, not even the older ones!
As you are, you will persist.
At the impact of your face.
As you were born, my sister.
You will never clean yourself of the blood, which you shed with cruelty.
The night is wrong and weak, let the day roll into your blade and shine with a thousand shines...
Whistles as it travels through the air.
He perished alone, but better than a king.
She may have disappeared, but her generosity never vanished.
O distant times, O youthful recklessness.
The strength and honor of the immortal hardly diminishes in the face of darkness.
I will drink thy blood gladly, that so	I may forget the blood of Beleg my master.
That is how things are, with no return possible.
Not lost, some things find no true master.
Unsuspected, surprising, dazzling such is your crystal bite.
From misdeeds to misdeeds, from betrayals to betrayals...
In three stages as in two, we are quickly injured.
Covered with a silver leaf, it turns it into a destructive weapon.
Son of the cries of suffering,	eternal memory of the unfortunate ones who fell under its yoke.
At the cost of your own integrity.
You are strong, very strong, the strongest of us.
I am not afraid of cruelty	or gratuitous violence.
Your legendary strength cannot be broken by any of us.
On your way will rise many tyrants, but none will resist you!
A memory does not protect,	a weapon can.
A short range guarantees a precise and fatal blow.
A single strike, a peak, and an entire empire collapsed!
The light is only illusory, everything	is night and is only revealed then.
It will last until the end of the war.
Serious and determined, such is the masterless warrior's determination.
The one that always gets you out of bad situations.
Go with pride, because only you could contemplate the darkness without flinching.
Carry us by your voice and only the initiated will recognize you, Tarja.

Separate the head from the body, and voila!

Seeing her, many are the warriors who broke a leg.

Slash at will, whether in your name or in your mother's.
Whoever looks down upon it desires her, and whoever disdains it, will die!
Every scar he leaves in his wake tears the mind with eternal pain.

Equipment of the infantryman, forced to the allegiance of his king.
The lucky one who wears it, will see his stature rise.

att2.advancement.collection.weapon_ouran: A good weapon for a brave boy.
A sign of peace on a tool of war.
Time doesn't make you decadent, but it will make you nostalgic.
Beyond the horizon comes a force that no man can tame.
Born to reign, fallen to save, as the day,	he returned, and till evening he stood.
It is not a musical instrument, and yet, I like to hear it.
Bad weather weighs on his heart as much as on his will...
The traitor knows no brother, he is alone, and that is his strength.
Untiringly, carry dreams to wonderful horizons.
So much hoped for, they annihilate the darkness so tenacious, without the slightest difficulty.
When ingenuity works of charity for the purest beauty.
A journey is more pleasant with friends.
If creativity is born of patience, perseverance is the mother of efficiency...
Did I fire six shots, or only five? Three? Seven. Whatever.
A shell that doesn't just protect against blows...
The scourge of words and letters.
The girl who was faster than the air.
The wise man always has a back seat.
Here's to you, Adrian, a brave warrior	who will never go into decline.
O sweet light of awakening, O deep and inalienable hope.
And don't remind me of home or	I might notice where I am.
Contemplative, as for the unattainable tomorrows; but impatient as well as desperate for the end.
att2.advancement.collection.weapon_stone: As at the beginning of the tarïn.
Land reddened by blood, air stained by despair.
Insatiable, he gathered a hundred souls before running to his death.

Break the guards of its opponents, to take them by the throat...
Brandished vertically, is the pride of the soldier and the plague of the rascal.
In the firmament sparkles with a thousand fire, the bloody tip of its blade.
Flawless, it protects and serves the family that gave birth to it.
Without gentleness or consideration, faces age with violence.
Discreet, it inexorably leads to an incisive cold.
Whose soiled image was washed with blood.
May you be proud of me, ancestor.
The more you know... the more you kill...
Fast it comes and nothing stops it.
Madness finally gains meaning, when it lets itself be guided by revenge.
att2.advancement.collection.weapon_supre: It hunts the fractures of fate, where the threads of time have unraveled.
It pierces the darkness of forgotten ages, guiding those who dare tread the shadows.
Witness to the first glimmers, it bears the weight of the souls that came before.
Each blow fractures time and space, until the final collapse.
It crushes the promises of dawn, leaving only the silence of an aborted day.
Forged in the echo of erased eras, it revives what was never meant to return.
A whisper of agony that ends the song of the living and the damned.
Raised against the assailants, defies even the breath of the gods.
att2.advancement.collection.weapon_woode: Keep your enemies in the distance.
May your arrows fly like a nightingale.
The whistle of the last arrow.
Many times lost, but always with regret.
Charming but destructive, it hunts without distinction of species.
Sting, pierce and kill, to you to whom hope was shattered.
Nothing stops your projectiles, not even the storm.
Like shooting stars, your arrows are blasting.
Go with the one archer because she is our mother's chosen one.
A weapon that has been used far too much.
One in two chances of working.
Sometimes you have to alleviate yourself.
When a blister becomes a weapon.
A cabinet maker with an imagination might surprise you.
Even the worst shooters can hit the bull's eye!
When there is a need to reduce the temptations, nothing beats the eternal silence of the protagonists.
Confers the simplest piece of wood, with relentless destructive power.
Properly maintained equipment is the true value of the warrior.
Old as the world but still so resilient.
Even though you never went into battle, they always remembered you.
A will of metal, which not even the torrent or the storm diminishes.
All is lost, the end is so near, but it will not come as long as the energy of despair lives in you.
This is the virtue of the best, because only them achieved the unachievable.

att2.advancement.secret.title.all_100: Don't trust people who tell you other people's secrets!
att2.advancement.secret.title.all_150: The best secrets are the most twisted!
att2.advancement.secret.title.all_250: All the secrets of the world worth knowing are hiding in plain sight!
att2.advancement.secret.title.symbol_25: The day You almost caught captain Jack Arrow
att2.advancement.secret.title.symbol_250: In the sails of Corto Maltese
att2.advancement.secret.title.symbol_750: Mr. Frodo I'm coming with you!
att2.advancement.secret.description.wall: Discover 1 secret buried in the wall
Discover 10 secrets buried in the wall
Discover 25 secrets buried in the wall
Discover 5 secrets buried in the wall
Discover 50 secrets buried in the wall
att2.advancement.story.title.mainquest_1: You don't take revenge on a demigod so easily!
After the words, time for action!
We are not at the end of our journey!
att2.advancement.story.title.mainquest_2: It's not the size that matters
att2.advancement.story.title.mainquest_3: A friend always here to help
There are some places in the universe you don't go alone
The past is never dead, it’s not even past
Do not go gentle into that good night
att2.advancement.story.title.mainquest_4: Alone... not you alone... not you alone
att2.advancement.story.description.nodea: Complete the main quest without dying once in gameplay.
Complete the main quest without dying once in gameplay in Nightmare difficulty.
att2.advancement.treasure.title.amethyst: Banishes inebriation and illuminates the spirit!
att2.advancement.treasure.description.am: Amethyst does not seek to shine; it exists to show the path.
att2.advancement.treasure.description.di: Better a diamond with a flaw than a pebble without
att2.advancement.treasure.description.es: Find your first Ecaille Souveraine du Chaos
att2.advancement.treasure.description.mo: Get your first piece of Chronotons
att2.advancement.treasure.description.ra: Force a store reset one time!
att2.advancement.treasure.description.ru: A ruby glows not with light, but with life.
Grind for a total of 100 runic powders.
Grind for a total of 25 runic powders.
Grind for a total of 2500 runic powders.
Grind for a total of 500 runic powders.
Grind for a total of 5000 runic powders.
att2.advancement.treasure.description.bo: It's closer than you think! (no it isn't)
Sometimes your life boils down to one insane move.
att2.advancement.treasure.title.bundle: Possibly useful, but usefulness is unlikely
att2.advancement.treasure.description.ch: Protruding mesh weave, woven with the utmost skill.
A perfection of jewelry, reflecting the entire natural spectrum of light.
att2.advancement.treasure.description.cr: Not even an army from the depths of the underworld could stand a chance.
att2.advancement.treasure.description.di: From the depths of the primordial universe, the wrath of the ancients is boiling.
Be your own refuge, be your own light.
Wake to see, your true emancipation is a fantasy.
Look on my works, Ye Mighty, and despair!
This mysteriously forged blade, contains an uncanny power.
May the sacred light inevitably fall on the worshipers of darkness.
att2.advancement.treasure.description.ir: Be responsible for what you have tamed.
It is very difficult to express oneself in words when faced with such a book.
What comes to the world and doesn't disturb anything deserves neither consideration nor patience.
Pierce through to the bowels of your enemies.
att2.advancement.treasure.description.le: The great ascent to reach a higher state.
You will never lose your breath again.
att2.advancement.treasure.description.ne: Each of your blows will bruise the old traditions, until they crack and tear apart.
I've worn lots of shoes. I bet if I think about it real hard I can remember my first pair of shoes.
Make sure you instill in your offspring the teachings they need to follow their destiny.
All the ignorant have faith in the immutability of Tellurön, because they don't know anything about the flows that roar below the surface.
It is up to Gaya alone to subject at the measure the absolute beauty.
A persistent rumor maintains that they were lost at a game of chance.
Its blows come down with enough strength to pulverize the hardest of rocks.
Those who stand up for others will find their inner strength.
The slide of his blade, in a whisper, instills respect in the heart of those who hear it.
att2.advancement.treasure.description.sh: A refuge so perfect that it will become your prison.
att2.advancement.treasure.description.sp: Death in rout will not be able to face the ultimate enlightenment.
